\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
{(\triangle , \delta )} \& {(F\triangle , \varphi (\delta ))} \& {((Ff)^\ast (Fg)_\ast (F\triangle), (Ff)^\ast (Fg)_\ast\varphi (\delta ))} \\
{(f^\ast g_\ast \triangle , f^\ast g_\ast \delta )} \& {(F(f^\ast g_\ast \triangle) , \varphi (f^\ast g_\ast \delta) )} \& {((Ff)^\ast (Fg)_\ast (F\triangle), \varphi (f^\ast g_\ast \delta))}
\arrow[Rightarrow, from=1-1, to=1-2]
\arrow[Rightarrow, from=1-1, to=2-1]
\arrow[Rightarrow, from=1-2, to=1-3]
\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-1, to=2-2]
\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-2, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
